title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet does not size correctly.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should size correctly in the property sheet.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Select a cell that requires the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet.
